metadata.title: CVE-2024-43800 on Ubuntu Pro FIPS-updates 20.04 LTS (focal) - medium
metadata.description: serve-static serves static files. serve-static passes untrusted user input- even after sanitizing it - to redirect() may execute untrusted code. Thisissue is patched in serve-static 1.16.0.

criterions.comment: node-serve-static package in focal is affected and may need fixing.
